It‚Äôs obvious the fucked up criminal politicians are behind this. I think they are shit scared of facing justice for all their criminal activity. 

This is the kind of fucking criminal activity the government and the criminals behind the government have being resorting to for the last 20 * years to ensure that there is no law and order in the country. 

This is the kind of behavior that calls for a revolution. This is a sure sign that the country has gone to the dogs because they do not want to see any law abiding citizen who has the right under the constitution to contest for such an important election. 

It‚Äôs pretty obvious that the criminal political dogs are running the show. A honest man is not welcome to save the country.

I am only hoping that the common man is taking in what theses criminal jokers are doing to the constitutional rights of the people. 

This calls for a mass revolution in the likes of the  Cheque republic and polish republic in the 80‚Äôs etc. it‚Äôs time the honest people band together with the clergy and demand that nobody is deprived of his or hers constitutional rights in this pivotal election. 

I would like to see what the fuck the Clergy in the country has to say with regard to these criminal actions. I suspect they are fucking scared to be right, maybe they don‚Äôt give a damn? Does the country really want to listen to these jokers when they are silent on such an important matter at this crucial time.

It‚Äôs time the forces and all of the law enforcement apparatus voice their opposition and do they have the balls to take appropriate action against the criminal actions by the government. Maybe they have been bought and sold like cattle as seen in parliament?

I would like to see what the international bodies‚Äô take on this type of behavior where fundamental rights have been trampled and deprived by the current government. 

I hope I don‚Äôt see a blood bath in the country it appears the elites are pushing the masses close to a precipices. You can only push the people only so far HISTORY has taught us what can happen.

To the wild criminal dogs who are behind it ‚Äî‚Äî BEWARE
comments.author: Ronnie Field
